name: incommensurable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be compared or judged by the same measure or standard: The two theories are incommensurable, making any attempt at comparison across disciplines ridiculous.incommensurable with Their conceptual frameworks are incommensurable with those of modern, Western medicine.
More examplesFewer examplesThe two conceptions of public space are incommensurable.Overall, the testimony collected supports at least two plausible yet incommensurable versions of events.To us, the plan seems to be based on several principles that are incommensurable with one another.
